attributes.action: Legislate to compel Housing Associations to replace gas boilers with solar heating
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the interests of cutting C.O. two emissions I believe it to be an excellent idea to replace gas central heating with solar heating. All housing associations should do this, and therefore there should be legislation compelling them to do so.
Furthemore solar heating can provide 70% free hot water, 90% in summer, this would ultimately be beneficial for those with very little money in the light of higher gas bills.
